entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Camrose
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Camrose 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Fog. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
